channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description: I think all of Moparscapes best coders should make a huge online role playong game like runscape just better this would be an amazing game!!!

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:397324”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=494475.msg3615089#msg3615089 date=1306894009]

Look at the people in my signature-They could go into the “MoparScape Pro Coders” category. I’m probably missing a few people but you get the point.

I Vain I has actually admitted he doesn’t much to me over MSN on a couple occasions.

@Topic - As said, there are a small number of people with the knowledge to do this in general, much less the skills to cooperate properly amongst each other friendly. If this was posted around 2 weeks ago I would consider myself in the few, but as one of my favorite quotes says. The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
[/quote]Who quotes that?

and lol^[/quote]
Michel Legrand

[quote=“zyle1992, post:16, topic:397324”]There are a lot of things that go into designing a game.

Genre, style, goal, language, modeling, advertisement, target audience, media.

There can be infinitely many opinions on each of those topics, causing infinitely many disagreements.[/quote]
Advertisement is not always needed. Hell, look at Minecraft for example.

Read full topic

Look at the people in my signature-They could go into the “MoparScape Pro Coders” category. I’m probably missing a few people but you get the point.

I don’t think Cole can code worth a monkey’s shit.
[/quote]

if somebody writes ::money { give the item "money" to player if player rights are "2" chatboxsays: man ur rich. }[/quote]
WRONG

if some1 rieit money plz giv moneh chatboxpl0xsay: man ur rich. IF HE NO ADMIN chatboxpl0xsay:GTFO FAGET
thats how you do it.

OT
I don’t think this would come together, many different opinions, and it would end up as an big mess.
